duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the funeral director with a variety of tasks during funerals and visitations to ensure that services run smoothly.
Maintain a friendly attitude while offering assistance and guidance to all persons entering the location.
Assist in the movement of the deceased and other related items in and out of visitation area, funeral home chapel, church, or other places of service.
Drive vehicles in the funeral cortege and other funeral-related activities.

education_certification.credential: Valid state-issued driver’s license with a clear driving record.
